mapper.select: select l.lnum, li.lname, li.credit, FIND_CODE_NAME(100, li.dcode) as division, l.TIMETABLE||' / '||lr.LRNAME as timeTable, case when retake_Check(#{sid},l.opennum) = '001' then 'Y' when retake_Check(#{sid},l.opennum) = '002' then 'N' end as reTake from lecture_info li, LECTURE l, lecture_room lr where li.LNUM = l.LNUM and l.LRCODE = lr.LRCODE and l.lyear = to_char(sysdate,'RRRR') and l.term = case when to_char(sysdate,'MM') >= 02 and to_char(sysdate,'MM') <= 08 then 1 else 2 end and li.GRADE = #{grade}
